archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Investigate Unapplied Party Payment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Investigate a party payment that could not be applied. This may involve finding that an incorrect bill or charge was referenced.

properties.value: Investigate Unapplied Party Payment determines why a party payment could not be applied. This may involve finding that an incorrect bill or charge was referenced. For example, a bill number may have transposed numbers that can be easily corrected without contacting the party who made the payment.
